Articles.Content: Not sure if it's stock or mod related but this a well reported bug. There are about half a dozen threads about it already.

Last I heard, it was USI OKS/MKS adding the default internal (which has crew seats) to probe cores that triggered this. Not sure if it's fixed yet so it might be worth a look over the appropriate mod thread.

- - - Updated - - -

[Here it is](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/126658-Rescue-missions-Sending-me-to-Probe-cores), there's both a MM patch and a pull request in that thread. I'm not using UKS myself though, so YMMV.

If it's not that (and you have a version of UKS with that patch) then it's time to go mod-bug hunting...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-09T07:48:35Z" title="08/09/2015 07:48  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 9, 2015</time> by steve\_v**
That would explain why I have not run into this bug myself. I do a lot of rescue missions but don't use USI OKS/MKS.
